“The show was struggling to book any decent guests and had a recent dip in ratings from its start earlier this year,” one source claimed of The Good Dish’s troubled beginnings.

Oz’s first guest ever was Oprah, while Daphne’s biggest star guest was Andy Cohen.”
Other guests included singer Marie Osmond, as well as Kim Kardashian's best friend Foodgod.
DR MEHMET Oz’s daughter Daphne’s new show has been canceled after she struggled to book A-list guests and failed to bring in high ratings, The Sun can report.
Back in November of 2021, Dr. Mehmet Oz announced that he was running for US Senate, and that his daughter was taking his place with her new talk show.
He faced backlash from the medical community for using his platform to release questionable information about the COVID-19 pandemic.
Sources exclusively told The Sun that Daphne’s cooking and talk show, The Good Dish, will not be returning for another season.
The source said her famous father's political leanings may have been partly to blame for the lackluster guest roster.
Oz eventually dialed back his endorsement, saying people should wait for more substantial evidence from trials.
